crops.name: Maize
crops.description: Maize is a staple food in East Africa, known for its versatility and nutritional value.

crops.name: Coffee
crops.description: Coffee is one of the major export crops in East Africa, known for its rich flavor and aroma.

crops.name: Tea
crops.description: Tea is widely grown in East Africa, particularly in Kenya and Uganda, and is known for its high quality.

practices.name: Crop Rotation
practices.description: Crop rotation helps maintain soil fertility and reduces the risk of pests and diseases.

practices.name: Organic Farming
practices.description: Organic farming avoids the use of synthetic chemicals and promotes biodiversity.

practices.name: Agroforestry
practices.description: Agroforestry integrates trees and shrubs into agricultural landscapes to improve soil health and provide additional income.
